title: Should I give improvement exam if I scored 80.6% in class 12th CBSE? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Well the answer is straight forward No!! 1- You have qualified the eligibility criteria for JEE If you are PCB student than well you have qualified the criteria for NEET 2- As you have secured in the range of 80% to 90% there is no need to unesscarily give the exam It would be not valuable for You to and you have to waste an year or be a dropper for giving the exam…. The exam is a golden chance to those who have secured below 75 %… Because they can't qualify the Jee main eligibility criteria..

Hii dear, Improvement exam is no ways a bad option .. The profit behind is that you'll get the result on the basis of best out of the two !! So choice is yours you can give it a try … If you won't get any profit out of it you won't loose too.. All the best!!
